name: Snowflake
semantic_context: Get, add and update data in Snowflake
natural_language_description: 这是 Snowflake 节点。主要用于: Get, add and update data in Snowflake

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: insert
available_options: Execute Query (值: executeQuery) - Execute an SQL query
Insert (值: insert) - Insert rows in database
Update (值: update) - Update rows in database

query.name: query
query.natural_language_description: 参数名: Query | 作用: The SQL query to execute | (必填项)

table.name: table
table.description: Name of the table in which to update data in
table.natural_language_description: 参数名: Table | 作用: Name of the table in which to update data in | (必填项)

columns.name: columns
columns.description: Comma-separated list of the properties which should used as columns for rows to update
columns.natural_language_description: 参数名: Columns | 作用: Comma-separated list of the properties which should used as columns for rows to update

updateKey.name: updateKey
updateKey.description: Name of the property which decides which rows in the database should be updated. Normally that would be "id".
updateKey.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Key | 作用: Name of the property which decides which rows in the database should be updated. Normally that would be "id". | 默认值: id | (必填项)
